EmailTemplate.name: Reminder 2 Days Later - Non Pinnacle
EmailTemplate.subject: Let's Get The Property Website Live!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I hope this email finds you well. As a reminder, the preview website is ready to review!
Please follow the 2 steps below
Review the website ➡️ View Here Approve/submit edits ➡️ Click Here
Let us know if you have any questions.
Best,
Self Serve Property Websites Luxury Presence Phone: (310) 955-1077 Email: support@luxurypresence.com
